description: If you've played <style=Variable>15</style> cards with different names this game, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Catastrophe</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: If you've played 15 cards with different names this game, summon Catastrophe.
flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan project engineer
name: Accelerated Purrsuit

description: When you cast a spell, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick
name: Assembly Bot

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavorText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, gatekeeper
name: Chempunk Shredder

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand an Epic card from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand an Epic card from your regions.
flavorText: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."
name: Eminent Benefactor

description: All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"
name: Funsmith

description: Deal 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavorText: "Let the show begin!" - Chempunk Shredder
name: Face-Melter

description: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."
name: Professor von Yipp

description: Grant me +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +4|+0 and Quick Attack once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.
name: Unstable Voltician

description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
descriptionRaw: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
name: Progress Day!

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: You have twenty seconds to comply.
name: Plaza Guardian

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Cloud</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
flavorText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Clump of Whumps

description: When I'm discarded, summon me.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, summon me.
flavorText: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx
name: Flame Chompers!

description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx
name: Get Excited!

description:
Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw:
Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
flavorText: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.
name: Flash of Brilliance

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Clouds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Mushroom Clouds in hand.
flavorText: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Chump Whump

flavorText: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan engineer
name: Amateur Aeronaut

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.
name: Intrepid Mariner

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavorText: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger
name: Sumpworks Map

description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
flavorText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.
name: Chempunk Pickpocket

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
flavorText: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman
name: Caustic Cask

description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavorText: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."
name: Anivia

description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.
name: Glacial Storm

description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
Shuffle an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Anivia</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Frostbite 2 enemies.
Shuffle an Anivia into your deck.
flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia
name: Anivia's Harsh Winds

description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavorText: "Cease your march and turn back your armies. The eye of winter has spied your conquest, and its icy claw closes tight about your treasonous hearts."
name: Anivia

description: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.
name: Glacial Storm

levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you're <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>, transform me back into <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Anivia</style></link> and Level Up.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round Start: If you're Enlightened, transform me back into Anivia and Level Up.
flavorText: In the depths of winter's cold embrace, the Freljord's guardian awaits the hour of her return.
name: Eggnivia

levelupDescription: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
levelupDescriptionRaw: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
flavorText: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."
name: Tryndamere

description:
Grant an ally +8|+4.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tryndamere</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +8|+4.
Shuffle a Tryndamere into your deck.
flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere
name: Tryndamere's Battle Fury

flavorText: "...And make THEM die for it."
name: Tryndamere

description: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian
name: Iceborn Legacy

description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen
name: Omen Hawk

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite 2 enemies.
flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia
name: Harsh Winds

description: The first time I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
flavorText:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"
name: Braum

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
descriptionRaw: Strike: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
flavorText: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.
name: Rimefang Wolf

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavorText: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.
name: Avarosan Marksman

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."
name: Scarthane Steffen

description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
flavorText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder
name: Lonely Poro

description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
flavorText: "Oho, there's a good lad! Even the coldest winter melts into spring." - Poro Herder
name: Jubilant Poro

description: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, Frostbite it.
flavorText: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen
name: Shatter

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Frostbite the Strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: You <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 5+ enemies<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crystal Arrow</style></link> on top of deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You Frostbite 5+ enemies. When I level up, create a Crystal Arrow on top of deck.
flavorText: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."
name: Ashe

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy and all other enemies with 3 or less Health. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy and all other enemies with 3 or less Health. Draw 1.
flavorText: "All the world on one arrow." - Ashe
name: Crystal Arrow

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
Enemies with 0 Power can't block.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Frostbite the Strongest enemy.
Enemies with 0 Power can't block.
flavorText: "You are not our enemy. Our true foe is the long, lawless winter. We are all people of the Freljord, and this land belongs to all of us!"
name: Ashe

description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Shuffle an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ashe</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Frostbite an enemy.
Shuffle an Ashe into your deck.
flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
name: Ashe's Flash Freeze

description: Draw a champion.
descriptionRaw: Draw a champion.
flavorText: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry
name: Entreat

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Scarmother Vrynna
name: Unscarred Reaver

flavorText: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!
name: Enraged Yeti

description: Deal 2 to ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to ALL units.
flavorText: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.
name: Avalanche

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Shuffle 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yetis</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Shuffle 2 Enraged Yetis into your deck.
flavorText: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper
name: Yeti Yearling

description: When I'm summoned, the enemy summons a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Snow Hare</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, the enemy summons a Snow Hare.
flavorText:
"You cannot make a wolf from a hare."
- Winter's Claw proverb
name: Stalking Wolf

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.
name: Avarosan Outriders

description: When I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
flavorText: "Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!" - Ingvar the Elder
name: Braum

description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Braum</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Shuffle a Braum into your deck.
flavorText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum
name: Braum's Take Heart

flavorText: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.
name: Alpha Wildclaw

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy with 3 or less Health.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy with 3 or less Health.
flavorText: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum
name: Brittle Steel

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”
name: Scarmother Vrynna

description: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then Frostbite all enemies.
flavorText: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.
name: Winter's Breath

description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."
name: Avarosan Hearthguard

description: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you have a Poro ally.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you have a Poro ally.
flavorText: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.
name: Poro Herder

flavorText: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"
name: Scarmaiden Reaver

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavorText: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere
name: Tarkaz the Tribeless

description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavorText: "... Maybe not that gracefully after all." - Tryndamere
name: Tarkaz's Fury

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Combine all of our Poros into a <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Fluft of Poros</style></link>, it gains their stats and keywords.
descriptionRaw: Play: Combine all of our Poros into a Fluft of Poros, it gains their stats and keywords.
flavorText:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."
name: Heart of the Fluft

flavorText:
"Wolf or hare, winter makes prey of us all."
- Avarosan proverb
name: Snow Hare

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Get an extra mana gem this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Get an extra mana gem this round.
flavorText: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe
name: Wyrding Stones

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.
name: Icevale Archer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavorText: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"
name: Kindly Tavernkeeper

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavorText: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: She Who Wanders

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavorText: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Balesight

description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan treatmaker
name: Poro Snax

description: Grant an ally +8|+4.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +8|+4.
flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere
name: Battle Fury

description: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH Round Start.
flavorText: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.
name: Warmother's Call

description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavorText: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia
name: Feral Mystic

description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Health.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Frostbite enemies with 3 or less Health.
flavorText: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Icy Yeti

flavorText: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.
name: Bull Elnuk

description: Give all allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.
name: Pack Mentality

description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper
name: Elixir of Iron

description: When I'm summoned, shuffle an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link> into the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, shuffle an Enraged Yeti into the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."
name: Avarosan Trapper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
flavorText: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Scarmother Vrynna
name: Troop of Elnuks

description: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
flavorText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum
name: Take Heart

description: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.
name: Catalyst of Aeons

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Frostbite the Strongest enemy.
flavorText: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."
name: Rimetusk Shaman

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Ancient Yeti

description: Deal 1 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavorText: Gotcha.
name: Bullseye

flavorText: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder
name: Mighty Poro

description: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
flavorText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere
name: Bloodsworn Pledge

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
name: Flash Freeze

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Heart of the Fluft</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Heart of the Fluft.
flavorText:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"
name: Fluft of Poros

description: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."
name: Starlit Seer

description: If you have a Yeti, summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link>. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
flavorText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Tall Tales

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
flavorText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Kindly Tavernkeeper
name: They Who Endure

description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"
name: Babbling Bjerg

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."
name: Avarosan Sentry

description: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.
name: Phantom Prankster

description: Kill an ally to draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavorText: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator
name: Glimpse Beyond

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Spiderling.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round Start: You have 3+ other Spiders.
flavorText: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.
name: Elise

description:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Elise</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
Shuffle a Elise into your deck.
flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.
name: Elise's Crawling Sensation

description: Other Spider allies have <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Other Spider allies have Challenger and Fearsome.
flavorText: Beauty is in the many eyes of the beholder.
name: Spider Queen Elise

description: To play me, kill 2 allies.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill 2 allies.
flavorText:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."
name: Ancient Crocolith

description: When you summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.
name: Soul Shepherd

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.
name: Onslaught of Shadows

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
flavorText: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.
name: Hecarim

description:
<link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> allies have +3|+0.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Ephemeral allies have +3|+0.
Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
flavorText: Listen. Hear him ride. The trampling of hooves. The creak of armor, long-worn and rusted. The ghostly cries of soldiers, echoes of the past. The resounding silence that follows.
name: Hecarim

description:
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Hecarim</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
Shuffle a Hecarim into your deck.
flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.
name: Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows

description:
If 3+ allies have died this round, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vilemaw</style></link>.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: If 3+ allies have died this round, summon Vilemaw.
flavorText: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise
name: Fresh Offerings

flavorText: "Who is your god? What can your god do? Will he let you wither and die defending him? Or will he give you life and vitality like no mortal has ever known? Why serve a god who won't serve you?" - Elise
name: Vilemaw

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Escaped Abomination</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon an Escaped Abomination.
flavorText: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.
name: Cursed Keeper

description: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
flavorText: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"
name: Scribe of Sorrows

flavorText: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.
name: Kalista

description: Each round, the first time I attack revive an attacking <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> dead allied follower. This round, we're bonded and it takes damage for me.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time I attack revive an attacking Ephemeral copy of the Strongest dead allied follower. This round, we're bonded and it takes damage for me.
flavorText: "The wronged shall have their vengeance!"
name: Kalista

description:
If an ally died this round, deal 3 to a unit.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kalista</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
If an ally died this round, deal 3 to a unit.
Shuffle a Kalista into your deck.
flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista
name: Kalista's Black Spear

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill the 2 Weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
name: Rhasa the Sunderer

description: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill the 2 Weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
flavorText: Thin the herd.
name: Night Harvest

flavorText: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
name: Spiderling

flavorText: No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.
name: Spectral Rider

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each ally that died this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each ally that died this game.
flavorText: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.
name: Scuttlegeist

flavorText: I mean, there are worse ways to die.
name: Sinister Poro

flavorText: Time may have stopped, but madness remains.
name: Escaped Abomination

flavorText:
"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."
name: Thresh

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Return me to hand.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
flavorText: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.
name: Commander Ledros

description: Revive the 6 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> allies that died this game and grant them <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Revive the 6 Strongest allies that died this game and grant them Ephemeral.
flavorText: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.
name: The Harrowing

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Revive me at the next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
flavorText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...
name: The Undying

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 4 from an ally.
descriptionRaw: Drain 4 from an ally.
flavorText: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh
name: Absorb Soul

description: If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.
name: Crawling Sensation

description: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
flavorText: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.
name: Tortured Prodigy

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally in hand Ephemeral and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: Oh, the poor lad...
name: Oblivious Islander

description:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Thresh</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Shuffle a Thresh into your deck.
flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh
name: Thresh's The Box

description: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
descriptionRaw: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
flavorText: "You're mine. Forever."Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...
name: Thresh

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally you have.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you have.
flavorText: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.
name: Iron Harbinger

description: If an ally died this round, deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: If an ally died this round, deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista
name: Black Spear

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"
name: Hapless Aristocrat

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and Ephemeral.
flavorText: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.
name: Stirred Spirits

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Unleashed Spirits</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Unleashed Spirits.
flavorText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.
name: Haunted Relic

flavorText: ...each spirit another victim of the relic's allure. They seethe in silence as they await the arrival of the next greedy fool.
name: Unleashed Spirit

description: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise
name: Frenzied Skitterer

description: Kill a unit.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit.
flavorText: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.
name: Vengeance

description: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh
name: The Box

description: To play me, kill an ally.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill an ally.
flavorText: You are what you eat.
name: Ravenous Butcher

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.
name: Mistwraith

description: Grant an ally +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavorText: Power, but at what cost?
name: Mark of the Isles

description: Steal an enemy follower this round. <style=Parentheses>(Can't play if you have 6 allies already.)</style>
descriptionRaw: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies already.)
flavorText: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.
name: Possession

description: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
descriptionRaw: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
flavorText: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.
name: Blade of Ledros

description: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and 1|1.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral and 1|1.
flavorText: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
name: Splinter Soul

description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
flavorText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.
name: Atrocity

description: Revive a random ally that died this round.
descriptionRaw: Revive a random ally that died this round.
flavorText: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator
name: Mist's Call

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavorText: They're hungriest when they hatch.
name: Brood Awakening

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavorText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.
name: Wraithcaller

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: The next time an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally attacks, revive me attacking.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: The next time an Ephemeral ally attacks, revive me attacking.
flavorText: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon
name: Shark Chariot

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally, then revive it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
flavorText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.
name: Chronicler of Ruin

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
flavorText: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!
name: Ethereal Remitter

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 3 from any unit.
descriptionRaw: Drain 3 from any unit.
flavorText: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.
name: Grasp of the Undying

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
flavorText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.
name: Spectral Matron

flavorText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.
name: Arachnoid Horror

description: When I'm summoned, revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> dead allied champion.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, revive the Strongest dead allied champion.
flavorText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?
name: The Rekindler

description: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: That which kills us makes them stronger.
name: Withering Wail

flavorText: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.
name: Darkwater Scourge

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand another <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> follower that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand another Last Breath follower that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…
name: Warden's Prey

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
name: Vile Feast

description: Kill ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Kill ALL units.
flavorText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.
name: The Ruination

flavorText: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
name: Soulgorger

description: Pick a follower. Create an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
flavorText: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.
name: Fading Memories

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0.
flavorText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...
name: Subpurrsible

description: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
flavorText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.
name: Veteran Investigator

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"
name: Gotcha!

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vault Breaker</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi
name: Vault Breaker

description: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook
name: Insightful Investigator

description: When you draw a card, give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> and create an exact copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: When you draw a card, give it Fleeting and create an exact copy of it in hand.
flavorText: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.
name: Chief Mechanist Zevi

description: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card <style=Parentheses>(max +8|+0)</style>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0).
flavorText: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator
name: Vi

description: Create in hand a 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Create in hand a 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
flavorText: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."
name: Trail of Evidence

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Set an ally to 4|4.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Set an ally to 4|4.
flavorText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
name: Suit Up!

description: When I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link> a unit while attacking, deal 5 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I Strike a unit while attacking, deal 5 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "So! Looks like your buddies are all tuckered out. You wanna tell me where you hid the hextech, or d'ya wanna make friends with the wall, too?"
name: Vi

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vault Breaker</style></link> in hand.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vi</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
Shuffle a Vi into your deck.
flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi
name: Vi's Vault Breaker

description: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
flavorText: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.
name: Patrol Wardens

flavorText: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand
name: Shellshocker

flavorText: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer
name: Slippery Waverider

description: <style=Variable></style>
flavorText:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam
name: The Beast Below

flavorText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."
name: Prowling Cutthroat

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune
name: Monkey Idol

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Mischievous little scamps, ain't they? More help than they seem, but word is they've got explosive tempers..." - Syren deckhand
name: Powder Monkey

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
name: Devourer of the Depths

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"She swallowed me whole, me skiff and me soul,
So I'm singin' this song in her belly,
And now I must wait 'til I meet my fate,
In the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
name: Devour

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."
name: Crackshot Corsair

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warning Shot</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Nab 1 and create a Warning Shot in hand.
flavorText: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."
name: Yordle Grifter

description:
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and shuffle 2 Treasures into your deck.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 2 and shuffle 2 Treasures into your deck.
flavorText: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher
name: Shipwreck Hoarder

description:
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
Deal 5 to ALL units.
descriptionRaw:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Deal 5 to ALL units.
flavorText: The deckhands roared as one and hauled the chains, their treasure now just below the calm waters. Little did they know the Seascraw's legendary cannon had one final act in store.
name: Keelbreaker

description:
Create 5 random cards in hand. They cost 0 and are <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
descriptionRaw:
Create 5 random cards in hand. They cost 0 and are Fleeting.
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
flavorText: Captain Finn roared out "Ye earned this, boys! Told ye the Tithe was nothin' but coward feed!" Some cheered, but not all. The waters seemed to still, save for the bubbles around the Rancour's hull.
name: Treasure Trove

flavorText: The terrifying beasts burst through the waves and split the hull with vice-like jaws. Though the sailors begged the Bearded Lady for mercy, their captain's greed had already sealed their fate.
name: Vicious Platewyrm

description:
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vicious Platewyrms</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Summon 3 Vicious Platewyrms.
flavorText: The grizzled captain held his shining quarry aloft and roared out "This'll keep us fer life!" Heady cheers rang out from the crew, while around their brig, the waters began to churn...
name: Platewyrm Egg

flavorText: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.
name: Bubble Bear

description:
To play me, discard 2.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 2 and give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, discard 2.
Attack: Draw 2 and give them Fleeting.
flavorText: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."
name: Brash Gambler

description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a 1 cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create in hand a 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavorText: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.
name: Coral Creatures

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant 1 cost allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant 1 cost allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.
name: Jagged Taskmaster

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then Rally.
flavorText: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."
name: Citrus Courier

description: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
flavorText: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.
name: Zap Sprayfin

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher
name: Razorscale Hunter

description: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies Vulnerable.
flavorText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.
name: Sheriff Lariette Rose

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.
name: Jagged Butcher

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Cast <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Cannon Barrage</style></link> 7 times on randomly targeted enemies.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Cast Cannon Barrage 7 times on randomly targeted enemies.
flavorText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"
name: Riptide Rex

description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: Gangplank's cruelty doesn't end with those who wrong him. To make an enemy of the Saltwater Scourge is to bring death upon everyone you hold dear.
name: Cannon Barrage

description:
<link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1.
flavorText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"
name: Abyssal Eye

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link> or a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Powder Keg or a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Powder Keg.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavorText: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.
name: Dreg Dredgers

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavorText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."
name: Dreadway Deckhand

description:
Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
Play: Draw a Gangplank.
flavorText:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"
name: The Dreadway

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavorText: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.
name: Slotbot

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Narwhal</style></link> for your opponent.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Golden Narwhal for your opponent.
flavorText: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.
name: Hunting Fleet

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
flavorText: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter
name: Smooth Soloist

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link>.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Miss Fortune.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.
name: The Syren

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me 2 random keywords.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me 2 random keywords.
flavorText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank
name: Plunder Poro

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next Round Start and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler
name: Pool Shark

description: When I'm summoned, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the Strongest enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."
name: Hired Gun

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
flavorText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.
name: Jaull Hunters

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
flavorText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"
name: Mystifying Magician

flavorText: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.
name: Golden Narwhal

description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Nab 1.
flavorText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"
name: Black Market Merchant

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Captain's orders: bullet to the face!" - Crackshot Corsair
name: Crackshot

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand
name: Gangplank

description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a Gangplank into your deck.
flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
name: Gangplank's Parrrley

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon a Powder Keg.
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Seen his eyes enough to know. Ain't nothin' but pure anger there. Someday, the boss'll do to Bilgewater what it did to him." - Petty Officer
name: Gangplank

description:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal <style=Variable>1</style> extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Where there's a keg, there's a way." - Bilgewater saying
name: Powder Keg

description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Blow 'em to the depths!" - Gangplank
name: Powderful Explosion

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."
name: Miss Fortune

description:
Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a Miss Fortune into your deck.
flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune
name: Miss Fortune's Make it Rain

description: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Most people don't get close enough to see the craftsmanship on these guns. Lucky you."
name: Miss Fortune

description: Deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Even if you fail to hear the bawdy cries of her crew, there's no way you'll miss her laughter...
name: Bullet Time

description: Deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "A little something to remember me by." - Miss Fortune
name: Love Tap

description: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
flavorText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...
name: Fizz

description:
When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Chum the Waters</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
Nexus Strike: Create a Chum the Waters in hand.
flavorText: ...while others insist he's just a playful child who safeguards others on their journeys home.
name: Fizz

flavorText: Though there may be ambiguity surrounding Fizz's temperament and intentions, there's absolutely none when it comes to Longtooth.
name: Longtooth

description:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fizz</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
Shuffle a Fizz into your deck.
flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz
name: Fizz's Playful Trickster

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Play a Destiny Card.
descriptionRaw: Play: Play a Destiny Card.
flavorText: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."
name: Twisted Fate

description: Deal 2 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 and Stun the Strongest enemy.
flavorText: "All that glitters..." - Twisted Fate
name: Gold Card

description: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
flavorText: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."
name: Twisted Fate

description:
Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Twisted Fate</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
Shuffle a Twisted Fate into your deck.
flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card

description:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate
name: Blue Card

description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate
name: Red Card

description: When I Level Up, copy <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I Level Up, copy Tossed allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note
name: Nautilus

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
